subtitle: A simple meal made from basically frozen ingredients so it is a good stand-by meal.

method.text:
Preheat oven to 220°C.
Arrange half the potato waffles in the base of an ovenproof dish.
Make up the white sauce according to the instructions on the pack. Mix together with the fish, peas and drained sweetcorn. Season to taste. Spoon over the waffles in the dish.
Top with the remaining waffles. Sprinkle with grated cheese.
Cook in oven for 25-30 min or until the waffles are golden brown and the filling is piping hot.

title: Waffle fish pie
